text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Yakhana tomadera bala haya majalisa-guloya jayaga kare da'o, takhana jayaga kare diyo, allah tomadera jan'ya jayaga kare debena. Ara yakhana bala haya uthe damra'o, takhana uthe damriyo, tomadera madhyera yara imana eneche o yadera jnana de'oya hayeche allah tadera stare stare maryadaya unnata karabena. Ara tomara ya karacha se-sanbandhe allah cira-oyakiphahala.
